1:1.$description: Square aspect ratio. Default illustrations, product or recipe thumbnail, also used for avatar pictures.

3:2.$description: Horizontal 3:2 aspect ratio. Use it for illustrations or images on mobile, it's not restricted for desktop either.

16:9.$description: Horizontal 16:9 aspect ratio. Use it for featured images or product shots (mostly sets) where the cropping area affects visibility of the entire image.

4:3.$description: Horizontal 4:3. Default use for single images on Hero sections.

1:1.$description: Square aspect ratio. Default illustrations, product or recipe thumbnail, also used for avatar pictures.
